item.description: {{ partial "header.html" . }} {{ partial "header_menu.html" . }} Organisation Snowcamp is a conference crafted by developers from the Grenoble area. It was started in 2016 on the initiative of AlpesJug. All organizers are enthusiast geeky volonteers. {{ range $.Site.Data.organisation.organizers }} {{.name}} {{ end }} {{ partial "

{{ partial "header.html" . }} {{ partial "header_menu.html" . }} 2018 How was 2018? Great with amazing subjects! In 2018, SnowCamp focused on 4 themes: Discovery, Web & Cloud, Security and IoT. You can find the agenda and some slides here! Sponsors 2018 Without them, nothing would have been possible. A big thank you to our sponsors 2018!

{{ partial "header.html" . }} {{ partial "header_menu.html" . }} Snowcamp The conference driving you (wal)nuts What is SnowCamp? First and foremost, it's a high-level technical conference that focuses on innovation. SnowCamp brings IT professionals and researchers together to discuss today's and tomorrowâ€™s technologies. SnowCamp is a unique concept: day-long workshops on Wednesday, to learn or improve a certain technology; a more classical conference on Thursday and Friday, with the bonus of allowing participants to discover research projects through 5 minutes pitches; a socializing and relaxing day on the snow, in the mountains, on Saturday.

{{ partial "header.html" . }} {{ partial "header_menu.html" . }} Become a sponsor Snowcamp is organized by a group of geeky volonteers. Their only motivation is to propose a unique conference gathering innovation and research. To make a success of this adventure, we need you. In return, we offer you a large visibility, on the web and during the event. It's the perfect opportunity to meet developers from Grenoble, demonstrate your products and services, and to make yourself known.

{{ partial "header.html" . }} {{ partial "header_menu.html" . }} Tickets You can buy a pack of 3 days (universities + conferences), or 2 days (conferences only). The tickets can be bought through our partner YouPlan. Beware, the number of attendees is limited and we were sold out last year! The store is open! From Thursday, 24th of November 2019 at 9:00 am (Paris Time Zone) (1st sale) and then from Monday, 4th of December at 2:00 pm (Paris Time Zone) (2nd sale): here.
